auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account to manage two-factor authentication
auth.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

auth.biometricsSupported: Your device supports biometric login (such as fingerprint or face recognition)
auth.webAuthnNotSupported: Your browser does not support WebAuthn. Please use the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge to enable biometric login.
auth.registerDescription: Register for 2FA Web to manage your two-factor authentication
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.otpCodeDescription: Your two-factor authentication codes are here. Click on a code to copy it.
dashboard.offlineWarning: You are currently in offline mode, some features may not be available.
dashboard.noAccounts: You haven't added any accounts yet

accounts.title: Account Management
accounts.manageDescription: Manage all your two-factor authentication accounts here
accounts.name: Name
accounts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this account?

settings.title: Settings
settings.autoLockDescription: Automatically lock the application after a period of inactivity
settings.lockTimeoutDescription: Time in minutes before auto-locking the application
settings.defaultDigitsDescription: Default number of digits for new accounts
settings.defaultPeriodDescription: Default period for new TOTP accounts
settings.passwordsDoNotMatch: New password and confirmation do not match
settings.passwordChangedSuccess: Your password has been successfully changed
settings.passwordChangeFailedRetry: Failed to change password, please try again later
settings.webauthnDescription: Use biometric authentication or security keys for authentication
settings.sessionManagementDescription: Manage your active sessions and login devices
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Actions in this section can lead to data loss or account deletion

webauthnGuide.mobileDeviceTipMessage: On mobile devices, you may be prompted to use fingerprint, face recognition, or device PIN
webauthnGuide.desktopDeviceTipMessage: On desktop, you may use built-in biometrics (Windows Hello, Touch ID) or an external security key
webauthnGuide.compatibilityNoteMessage: WebAuthn is supported in all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
webauthnGuide.securityKeyMessage: You'll need a security key (like YubiKey) or other external authenticator to use WebAuthn on this device.
webauthnGuide.whatIsWebauthnContent1: WebAuthn (Web Authentication) is a standard that allows users to authenticate without passwords, using biometrics (fingerprint, facial recognition) or security keys.
webauthnGuide.whatIsWebauthnContent2: It's more secure than passwords because it uses public key cryptography and is resistant to phishing attacks.
webauthnGuide.howToRegister: How to Register a WebAuthn Credential?
webauthnGuide.registrationStepsIntro: Registering biometric login only takes a few simple steps:
webauthnGuide.registrationStep2Mobile: Follow the device prompts to verify using your fingerprint or facial recognition
webauthnGuide.registrationStep2Desktop: Follow the system prompts to verify using your fingerprint, facial recognition, or Windows Hello
webauthnGuide.registrationStep2SecurityKey: Insert your security key and press the button when prompted
webauthnGuide.registrationStep3: Name your credential (e.g., "Personal Phone Fingerprint", "Work Laptop Face ID")
webauthnGuide.registrationStep4: Your credential is now registered and can be used for login
webauthnGuide.loginStepsIntro: Once registered, logging in with WebAuthn is simple:
webauthnGuide.loginStep1: Click "Login with Biometrics or Security Key"
webauthnGuide.loginStep2: Follow the prompts to verify your identity using the same method you registered with
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingIntro: If you encounter issues with biometric login, try these solutions:
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingTip1: Ensure your browser is up to date
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingTip2: Make sure your device supports biometric features
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingTip3: If using a security key, ensure it is correctly inserted
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingTip4: Try refreshing the page and trying again
webauthnGuide.troubleshootingTip5: If the problem persists, you can use password login
webauthnGuide.securityNote: Biometric data never leaves your device. We only store the public key used for verification, while the private key and biometric data remain on your device.

webauthn.title: WebAuthn Settings
webauthn.description: WebAuthn allows you to log in using fingerprints, facial recognition, or security keys without entering a password.
webauthn.notSupportedDescription: Your browser or device does not support WebAuthn. Please update to the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge.
webauthn.registerDescription: You can register biometric authenticators (such as fingerprint or facial recognition) or security keys (such as YubiKey) on your device for passwordless login.
webauthn.platformAuthenticatorNotSupportedMessage: Your device does not support platform authenticators. You can still register using a security key (such as YubiKey).
webauthn.pleaseEnterName: Please enter a name for this credential
webauthn.followDevicePrompts: Please follow your device prompts to complete registration
webauthn.securityTipMessage: Please note the following when using WebAuthn:
webauthn.securityTip1: WebAuthn credentials are bound to your device and cannot be used on other devices
webauthn.securityTip2: Ensure your device is secure and do not allow others to access your biometric data
webauthn.securityTip3: It is recommended to register multiple login methods in case one method becomes unavailable

webauthn.title: WebAuthn Settings
webauthn.unsupported: Your browser does not support WebAuthn
webauthn.instructions: Please follow your device prompts to complete verification

webauthnCredentials.title: WebAuthn Credentials
webauthnCredentials.subtitle: Manage your biometric and security key credentials
webauthnCredentials.description: These are all your registered WebAuthn credentials for passwordless login.
webauthnCredentials.noCredentialsDescription: You haven't registered any WebAuthn credentials yet.
webauthnCredentials.deleteCredentialDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this credential? This action cannot be undone.
webauthnCredentials.registrationInstructions: You will be prompted to use your fingerprint, facial recognition, or security key

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.importDescription: Import accounts from a file or QR code
importExport.supportedFileTypes: Supports JSON, text files and QR code images
importExport.importNote: Import will add new accounts but will not overwrite existing ones. If imported accounts have the same name and issuer as existing ones, you will need to resolve conflicts manually.
importExport.includeSecrets: Include secrets (insecure, but allows full migration)
importExport.encryptionPasswordDescription: Password used to encrypt the export file
importExport.securityMessage: If you choose to include secrets, ensure you encrypt the export file with a strong password and keep that password in a secure place.

encryption.title: Encryption Settings
encryption.description: Manage encryption settings for your data
encryption.encryptionKeyDescription: Your encryption key is used to encrypt and decrypt your data. Never share this key with anyone.
encryption.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable encryption? Your data will no longer be encrypted on the server.
encryption.keyGenerationFailed: Failed to generate new encryption key
encryption.saveKeyWarning: Make sure to save your encryption key in a secure location. If you lose this key, you will not be able to decrypt your data.
encryption.enablePrompt: Enable encryption to protect your data
encryption.createMasterPassword: Create a master password for encryption
encryption.passwordDescription: This password will be used to encrypt and decrypt your data
encryption.forgotPasswordWarning: If you forget your master password, you will not be able to recover your data
encryption.passwordNotStored: Your password is not stored anywhere and cannot be retrieved
encryption.passwordNeededEachTime: You will need to enter your password each time you want to access encrypted data
encryption.weakPasswordWarning: The password you entered is weak. Consider using a stronger password.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Backup and restore your application data
backup.backupDescription: Create a backup of your accounts and settings.
backup.createBackupDescription: Create a complete backup of your application data, including all accounts, groups, and settings.
backup.encryptionRecommendation: It is strongly recommended to encrypt your backup file to protect your sensitive data.
backup.enterStrongPassword: Enter a strong password to protect your backup
backup.restoreDescription: Restore your accounts and settings from a backup file.
backup.restoreWarning: Restoring will add accounts and groups from the backup, with an option to overwrite existing data.
backup.overwriteExisting: Overwrite existing (if accounts or groups with the same names exist)
backup.weakPasswordConfirmation: The password you entered is weak, which may reduce the security of your backup. Are you sure you want to continue?
backup.selectFileAndEnterPassword: Please select a file and enter the password
backup.invalidFormatOrNoAccounts: Invalid backup format or no accounts

sessionManagement.title: Session Management
sessionManagement.description: Manage your active sessions and login devices
sessionManagement.allOtherSessionsRevokedSuccess: All sessions on other devices have been successfully revoked
sessionManagement.noActiveSessionsMessage: You have no active sessions at the moment.
sessionManagement.confirmRevokeAllMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke all sessions on other devices? This will force all other devices to log in again.

errors.generic: An error occurred, please try again later
errors.network: Network error, please check your connection
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found
errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later
